properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 3 at 1:58PM CST until January 5 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Nashville TN
properties.description:
...The Flood Advisory continues for the Cumberland River...

Cumberland River At Nashville affecting Davidson County

. With rains tapering off, water levels should start leveling out. The
Cumberland River at Nashville seems to have done this, cresting at about 31.5
feet this afternoon. Look for water to begin receding over the next 12 hours.

The Flood Advisory continues for
The Cumberland River At Nashville
* Until late Saturday night.
* At 1 PM Friday the river was cresting near 31.3 feet.
* Flood stage is 40.0 feet.
* Action stage is 30.0 feet.
* The river will start to fall to near 29.7 feet by tomorrow morning.
* At 30.0 feet...Water reaches the first grassy area of the riverfront landing,
and the access point on the east side of the river near Nissan Stadium.
* At 25.0 feet...The riverfront recreation areas on both sides of the river
begin to be inundated.
properties.instruction:
Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio or other local media for further information
from the National Weather Service.
